ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Lost Dugeons of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah. If you opt to get the download only version you might want to suck up to a friend to burn copies of the files onto a CD and send to you. I was shocked
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah. If you opt to get the download only version you might want to suck up
to a friend to burn copies of the files onto a CD and send to you.
I was shocked when I found a woman in the hardware store in this small town
who actually plays EQ.
luv,
-Su

Awhile back they had a patch where you could opt to download it in smaller
chunks as they became available... all you had to do was click on yes.
This is exactly what they were tryign to avoid because the network traffic
ties up the bandwidth when people do this and nobody can connect.

T1 will still take a good chunk of time, but not an entire day.

Wulfric





----- Original Message -----
From: Enie
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, September 10, 2003 11:50 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Lost Dugeons of Norrath


I did something really stupid last night. I logged into Everquest and
opted to purchase LDoN online. One suggestion, DON'T do it if you
have a 56K dial-up connection LOL. It started to download and said it
would take 22 hours and 26 minutes! I guess I will take my laptop to
work and download it on the T1 LOL. Sheesh!
